00275 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00276 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& b, bool
00277     force_thread_safety)
00278 {
00279     if (Nothrow) {
00280         try {
00281             data = b.data;
00282             if (!data.is_nan()) {
00283                 if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false)
00284                     data.make_unique();
00285             }
00286         } catch (std::exception&) {
00287             data.make_nan();
00288         }
00289     } else {
00290         data = b.data;
00291         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00292     }
00293 }

00296 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00297 template <typename charT>
00298 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const charT *str, std::size_t base) {
00299     if (Nothrow) {
00300         try {
00301             const std::basic_string<charT>& tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00302             if (str[0] == tnan[0] && std::basic_string<charT>(str) == tnan) {
00303                 data.make_nan();
00304             } else {
00305                 data.from_string(str, base);
00306             }
00307         } catch (std::exception&) {
00308             data.make_nan();
00309         }
00310     } else {
00311         data.from_string(str, base);
00312     }
00313 }
00314 
00343 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00344 template <typename charT>
00345 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const charT *str, const charT*& endptr,
00346     std::size_t base)
00347 {
00348     if (Nothrow) {
00349         try {
00350             const std::basic_string<charT>& tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
00351             if (str[0] == tnan[0]) {
00352                 std::basic_string<charT> s(str);
00353                 if (s.substr(0, tnan.length()) == tnan) {
00354                     data.make_nan();
00355                     endptr = str + tnan.length();
00356                     return;
00357                 }
00358             }
00359             data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00360         } catch (std::exception&) {
00361             data.make_nan();
00362         }
00363     } else {
00364         data.from_string(str, endptr, base);
00365     }
00366 }
00367 
00392 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00393 template <typename charT, typename traitsT, typename allocT>
00394 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const std::basic_string<charT, traitsT,
00395     allocT>& str, std::size_t base)
00396 {
00397     if (Nothrow) {
00398         try {
00399             if (str == detail::nan_text<charT>()) data.make_nan();
00400             else data.from_string(str, base);
00401         } catch (std::exception&) {
00402             data.make_nan();
00403         }
00404     } else {
00405         data.from_string(str, base);
00406     }
00407 }

00430 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00431 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, bitsize_t bits) {
00432     if (Nothrow) {
00433         try {
00434             data.from_binary(b, bits);
00435         } catch (std::exception&) {
00436             data.make_nan();
00437         }
00438     } else {
00439         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00440     }
00441 }

00455 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00456 BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TPL
00457 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_OTHER_TYPE& b, bool
00458     force_thread_safety)
00459 {
00460     if (Nothrow) {
00461         try {
00462             if (b.is_nan()) {
00463                 data.make_nan();
00464             } else {
00465                 data = b._data();
00466                 if (!data.is_nan() && force_thread_safety && Threadsafe ==
00467                     false) data.make_unique();
00468             }
00469         } catch (std::exception&) {
00470             data.make_nan();
00471         }
00472     } else {
00473         if (b._data().is_nan()) throw exceptions::not_a_number();
00474         data = b._data();
00475         if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00476     }
00477 }

00491 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00492 template <typename Type> BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::integer_t(const Type n,
00493     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*)
00494 {
00495     if (Nothrow) {
00496         try {
00497             if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00498             else data.set_unsigned(n);
00499         } catch (std::exception&) {
00500             data.make_nan();
00501         }
00502     } else {
00503         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00504         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00505     }
00506 }

00508 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00509 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::
00510     operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00511 {
00512     if (Nothrow) {
00513         if (c._data().is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00514         else {
00515             try {
00516                 data = c.data;
00517                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00518             } catch (std::exception&) {
00519                 data.make_nan();
00520             }
00521         }
00522     } else {
00523         data = c.data;
00524         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00525     }
00526     return *this;
00527 }

00537 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00538 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator~() const {
00539     if (Nothrow) {
00540         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00541         try {
00542             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00543             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00544             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00545         } catch (std::exception&) {
00546             return nan();
00547         }
00548     } else {
00549         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(~data);
00550         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00551         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00552     }
00553 }

00561 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00562 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator-() const {
00563     if (Nothrow) {
00564         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00565         try {
00566             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00567             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00568             r.data = -r.data;
00569             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00570         } catch (std::exception&) {
00571             return nan();
00572         }
00573     } else {
00574         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(*this);
00575         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00576         r.data = -r.data;
00577         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00578     }
00579 }

00584     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE b)
00585 {
00586     if (Nothrow) {
00587         if (b.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00588         if (!is_nan()) {
00589             try {
00590                 data += b.data;
00591                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00592             } catch (std::exception&) {
00593                 data.make_nan();
00594             }
00595         }
00596     } else {
00597         data += b.data;
00598         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00599     }
00600     return *this;
00601 }

00744     if (Nothrow) {
00745         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00746         try {
00747             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data++);
00748             if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00749             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00751             data.make_nan();

00753     } else {

00755         if (Threadsafe == true) { r._make_unique(); data.make_unique(); }
00756         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00757     }

00830 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00831 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator^=(const
00832     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n)
00833 {
00834     if (Nothrow) {
00835         if (n.is_nan()) data.make_nan();
00836         if (!is_nan()) {
00837             try {
00838                 data ^= n.data;
00839                 if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00840             } catch (std::exception&) {
00841                 data.make_nan();
00842             }
00843         }
00844     } else {
00845         data ^= n.data;
00846         if (Threadsafe == true) data.make_unique();
00847     }
00848     return *this;
00849 }
00850 
00859 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00860 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::operator<<(bitsize_t shift)
00861     const
00862 {
00863     if (Nothrow) {
00864         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00865         try {
00866             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00867             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00868             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00869         } catch (std::exception&) {
00870             return nan();
00871         }
00872     } else {
00873         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data << shift);
00874         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00875         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00876     }
00877 }

00890 {

00892         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00893         try {
00894             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data >> shift);
00895             if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00896             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

00898             return nan();
00899         }
00900     } else {
00901         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(data >> shift);
00902         if (Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
00903         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00904     }
00905 }

01118 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01119 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan() {
01120     if (Nothrow) {
01121         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01122         r._data().make_nan();
01123         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01124     } else {
01125         throw exceptions::not_a_number();
01126     }
01127 }

01151 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01152 template <class Type>
01153 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::random_by_size(Type& gen,
01154     bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
01155     can_be_negative)
01156 {
01157     if (Nothrow) {
01158         try {
01159             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(datatype::random_by_size(gen,
01160                 size_in_bits, high_bit_on, low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
01161         } catch (std::exception&) {
01162             return nan();
01163         }
01164     } else {
01165         return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(datatype::random_by_size(gen,
01166             size_in_bits, high_bit_on, low_bit_on, can_be_negative));
01167     }
01168 }

01210     }

01230 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01231 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE abs(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
01232     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01233         if (n.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01234         try {
01235             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01236             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01237             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01238         } catch (std::exception&) {
01239             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01240         }
01241     } else {
01242         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n._data().abs());
01243         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01244         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01245     }
01246 }
01247 
01266 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01267 typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t divide(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE
01268     dividend, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE divisor)
01269 {
01270     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01271         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan()) return typename
01272             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(),
01273                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01274         try {
01275             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01276                 detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01277             typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t
01278                 r(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(rr.quotient),
01279                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(rr.remainder));
01280             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01281         } catch (std::exception&) {
01282             return typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t(
01283                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(), BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan());
01284         }
01285     } else {
01286         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::datatype::divide_t rr =
01287             detail::divide(dividend._data(), divisor._data());
01288         typename BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::divide_t
01289             r(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(rr.quotient),
01290             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(rr.remainder));
01291         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01292     }
01293 }

01323             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01324         }
01325     } else {
01326         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(detail::square(n._data()));
01327         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01328         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01329     }

01342     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE e)
01343 {
01344     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01345         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01346         try {
01347             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01348             pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01349             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01350             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01351         } catch (std::exception&) {
01352             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01353         }
01354     } else {
01355         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
01356         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
01357         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01358         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01359     }
01360 }

01412 template <typename T, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4>
01413 T to(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
01414     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01415         if (n.is_nan()) return T(0);
01416         try {
01417             return to<T>(n._data());
01418         } catch (std::exception&) {
01419             return T(0);
01420         }
01421     } else {
01422         return to<T>(n._data());
01423     }
01424 }

01448 template<typename charT, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4>
01449 std::basic_string<charT> to_stringtype(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n,
01450     std::size_t base = 10, bool uppercase = false)
01451 {
01452     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01453         if (n.is_nan()) return detail::nan_text<charT>();
01454         try {
01455             return detail::to_string<charT>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01456         } catch (std::exception&) {
01457             return std::basic_string<charT>();
01458         }
01459     } else {
01460         return detail::to_string<charT>(n._data(), base, uppercase);
01461     }
01462 }

01686     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE by, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE modulus)
01687 {
01688     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01689         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return
01690             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01691         try {
01692             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01693                 modulus._data()));
01694             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01695             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01696         } catch (std::exception&) {
01697             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01698         }
01699     } else {
01700         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(mulmod(n._data(), by._data(),
01701             modulus._data()));
01702         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
01703         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01704     }
01705 }

01776             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

01778             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();

01782             modulus._data(), no_monty));

01810             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);

01853 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01854 int is_prime(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n, callback_t callback = no_callback)
01855 {
01856     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01857         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
01858         try {
01859             return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01860         } catch (std::exception&) {
01861             return -2;
01862         }
01863     } else {
01864         return is_prime(n._data(), callback);
01865     }
01866 }
01868 
01876 
01877 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01878     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01879 {
01880     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01881         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01882         try {
01883             return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01884         } catch (std::exception&) {
01885             return false;
01886         }
01887     } else {
01888         return operator<(n1._data(), n2._data());
01889     }
01890 }
01891 
01892 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator>(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01893     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01894 {
01895     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01896         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01897         try {
01898             return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01899         } catch (std::exception&) {
01900             return false;
01901         }
01902     } else {
01903         return operator>(n1._data(), n2._data());
01904     }
01905 }
01906 
01907 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL bool operator<=(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01908     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01909 {
01910     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01911         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01912         try {
01913             return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01914         } catch (std::exception&) {
01915             return false;
01916         }
01917     } else {
01918         return operator<=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01919     }
01920 }

01923     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01924 {
01925     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01926         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01927         try {
01928             return operator>=(n1._data(), n2._data());
01929         } catch (std::exception&) {
01930             return false;
01931         }

01934     }

01938     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01939 {
01940     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01941         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return false;
01942         try {
01943             return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01944         } catch (std::exception&) {
01945             return false;
01946         }
01947     } else {
01948         return operator==(n1._data(), n2._data());
01949     }
01950 }

01982 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01983 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE operator+(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const
01984     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2)
01985 {
01986     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
01987         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01988         try {
01989             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n1._data() + n2._data());
01990             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01991         } catch (std::exception&) {
01992             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
01993         }
01994     } else {
01995         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(n1._data() + n2._data());
01996         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01997     }
01998 }

02196 
02206 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02207 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE gcd(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num1, const
02208     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num2)
02209 {
02210     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02211         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02212             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02213         try {
02214             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02215             gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02216             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02217             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02218         } catch (std::exception&) {
02219             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02220         }
02221     } else {
02222         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02223         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02224         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02225         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02226     }
02227 }
02228 
02239 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02240 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE lcm(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num1, const
02241     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE num2)
02242 {
02243     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02244         if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return
02245             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02246         try {
02247             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02248             lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02249             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02250             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02251         } catch (std::exception&) {
02252             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan();
02253         }
02254     } else {
02255         BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r;
02256         lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
02257         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique();
02258         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
02259     }
02260 }

02274 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02275 int compare(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2,
02276     bool ignoresign = false)
02277 {
02278     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02279         if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
02280         try {
02281             return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02282         } catch (std::exception&) {
02283             return 2;
02284         }
02285     } else {
02286         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
02287     }
02288 }
02289 
02306 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02307 size_t log2(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n) {
02308     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02309         if (n.is_nan()) return 0;
02310         try {
02311             return log2(n._data());
02312         } catch (std::exception&) {
02313             return 0;
02314         }
02315     } else {
02316         return log2(n._data());
02317     }
02318 }

02322 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
02323     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02324     rtype op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02325         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02326             try { \
02327                 return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02328             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02329                 return rtype(0); \
02330             } \
02331         } else { \
02332             return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
02333         } \
02334     } \
02335     \
02336     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02337     rtype op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02338         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02339             try { \
02340                 return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02341             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02342                 return rtype(0); \
02343             } \
02344         } else { \
02345             return op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
02346         } \
02347     }
02348 
02349 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
02350 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
02351 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
02352 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
02353 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
02354 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
02355 BOOST_XINT_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)
02356 
02358 #define BOOST_XINT_ANY_MATH(op) \
02359     template <class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4, typename N> \
02360     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
02361         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02362             try { \
02363                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2)));\
02364                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02365                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02366             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02367                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02368             } \
02369         } else { \
02370             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n2))); \
02371             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02372             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02373         } \
02374     } \
02375     \
02376     template <typename N, class A0, class A1, class A2, class A3, class A4> \
02377     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
02378         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) { \
02379             try { \
02380                 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2));\
02381                 if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02382                 return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02383             } catch (std::exception&) { \
02384                 return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::nan(); \
02385             } \
02386         } else { \
02387             BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2)); \
02388             if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Threadsafe == true) r._make_unique(); \
02389             return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
02390         } \
02391     }

02411 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02412     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
02413     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const
02414     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE n)
02415 {
02416     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow && n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out,
02417         detail::nan_text<charT>());
02418     return operator<<(out, n._data());
02419 }
02420 
02421 template <typename charT, typename traits, class A0, class A1, class A2, class
02422     A3, class A4> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
02423     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE&
02424     n)
02425 {
02426     if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE::Nothrow) {
02427         const std::basic_string<charT>& tnan = detail::nan_text<charT>();
02428         charT nextchar = charT(in.peek());
02429         if (nextchar == tnan[0]) {
02430             // Must be either #NaN# or an error
02431             std::vector<charT> buffer;
02432 
02433             charT p = 0;
02434             for (std::size_t i = 0; i < tnan.length(); ++i) {
02435                 in >> p;
02436                 buffer.push_back(p);
02437             }
02438             buffer.push_back(0);
02439 
02440             std::basic_string<charT> str(&buffer[0]);
02441             if (str == tnan) n = n.nan();
02442             else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
02443             return in;
02444         }
02445     }
02446     return operator>>(in, n._data());
02447 }

02451 inline void swap(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& left, BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPE& right)
02452 {
02453     left._swap(right);
02454 }

02475 #define BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME boost::xint::integer_t<A0, A1, A2, A3, A4>
02476 
02477 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
02478 class numeric_limits<BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME> {
02479     public:
02480     static const bool is_specialized;
02481 
02482     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME min BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02483         throw()
02484     {
02485         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02486             return -~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02487         else return 0;
02488     }
02489     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME max BOOST_PREVENT_MACRO_SUBSTITUTION()
02490         throw()
02491     {
02492         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits)
02493             return ~(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME());
02494         else return 0;
02495     }
02496 
02497     static const int digits;
02498     static const int digits10;
02499     static const bool is_signed;
02500     static const bool is_integer;
02501     static const bool is_exact;
02502     static const int radix;
02503     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME epsilon() throw() { return 0; }
02504     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME round_error() throw() { return 0; }
02505 
02506     static const int min_exponent; // N/A
02507     static const int min_exponent10; // N/A
02508     static const int max_exponent; // N/A
02509     static const int max_exponent10; // N/A
02510 
02511     static const bool has_infinity; // N/A
02512     static const bool has_quiet_NaN;
02513     static const bool has_signaling_NaN; // N/A
02514     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm; // N/A
02515     static const bool has_denorm_loss; // N/A
02516 
02517     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME infinity() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02518     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME quiet_NaN() throw() {
02519         if (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Nothrow)
02520             return BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::nan();
02521         else return 0;
02522     }
02523     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02524     static BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // N/A
02525 
02526     static const bool is_iec559; // N/A
02527     static const bool is_bounded;
02528     static const bool is_modulo;
02529 
02530     static const bool traps; // I assume this means exceptions?
02531     static const bool tinyness_before; // N/A
02532     static const float_round_style round_style; // N/A
02533 };

02540     static_cast<int>(BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits);

02545     BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Bits));

02573

02576     (BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TYPENAME::Nothrow ? true : false);
